name: Pocket Monsters II
overview: Pocket Monsters 2, also titled Pocket Monster II and Pikaqiu II (皮卡丘II), is an assumed sequel to Pocket Monster, and is an unlicensed game for the Sega Mega Drive. Like its prequel, it is based on Nintendo's Pokémon franchise, and is a platform game where the player controls Pikachu. Some of the opponents are based on Mega Bomberman and Magical Taruruto-kun enemies.
